title: Civil Rights Movement and American Democracy

vocab.definition: Militant approach emphasizing African American self-determination and pride
Racial separation existing in practice without legal requirement
Negative reaction by whites to civil rights gains and social changes
Recognition that individuals face multiple, overlapping forms of discrimination
Institutional patterns and policies that perpetuate racial inequality

teachingNotes: Examine complex dynamics within civil rights movement and its evolution. Analyze continuing challenges and contemporary relevance.

sample.question: What approach emphasized African American self-determination and pride?

truefalse.question: De facto segregation exists in practice without legal requirement.

multiplechoice.question: What recognizes multiple, overlapping forms of discrimination?

fillintheblank.question: Institutional patterns perpetuating racial inequality constitute ________ racism.

shortanswer.question: How did white backlash affect civil rights progress?
